storyInfo: After her meal, Durin runs into a new operator, Sesa, who seems to be having some trouble. As his senior, Durin steps in to help him out of his pinch, a rare occurrence indeed.

attributes.content: 12:10 P.M. \ Clear
Rhodes Island Cafeteria
Auntie, I'd like a mushroom meal set—
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: With extra berry jam and bean paste, thank you.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Whew.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Pff... Pff... That's hot...
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Oh, if it isn't Durin. Mind if I have a seat?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Sure, no problemo~
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Appreciate it. It's pretty packed around this time, and just about everywhere is filled up.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: You by yourself? Where's ol' Rangers, and Yato's crew?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I came here first.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Training just ended, so they're still cleaning up. We're about to go get some barbecue.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Huh? If you're going to have barbecue, why'd you order that mushroom combo?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: It's fiiine. This tiny portion's basically just a quick little snack—
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Ahhh——mm.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: (Takes a huge bite and starts chewing)
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Wait... am I seeing things?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: There was a whole plate of food in front of you just three seconds ago, and now half of it's gone?! Shouldn't you slow down?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Heh heh, that's nothing.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: The food on the surface is really different from the stuff back home. I'm already going slow enough to taste it.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Ahh, but mushrooms are delicious no matter how you cook them.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Yeah, we all know how much you love fungus by now.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Real talk though, aren't you worried about getting malnourished, always eating the same kind of food?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Nooope.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Whew, that hit the spot. All finished here.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Huuuh? Wait, when'd you finish eating... I told you, you eat way too fast. Are you sure you're alright?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Yes, I'm fine. Don't worry.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: I can eat even faster... But, Medical chewed me out when I had that speed-eating contest with Noir Corne, so I've been taking it easy the last couple days.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: What the heck do you guys do for fun?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: You know, normal stuff. It's totally fine.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: *Yawn*... Eating always makes me sleepy. The others sure are taking their sweet time...
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: I'll go grab a drink to perk myself up—
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: (Hmm, I still have some leftover fruit drinks from last time.)
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: (But it's too far to go back to the lounge... *Yawn*... and I'm getting a bit sleepy...)
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: (Oh, right, there should be some coffee in the common room now, right?)
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: What's with the racket?
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Ugh, who's that over there...?
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Gah. Such a beautiful afternoon, but some people don't know to appreciate it.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: I feel the convulsions of an evil power... Hey, big guy, control yourself, stop—
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Wait, hey, stop it, bro, are you trying to hurt me?!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Who the hell did this? Installing such a huge machine and mounting it with such dangerous heavy weaponry!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: 'ello.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Dammit, how could this happen?! The mist of evil will spread if this is allowed to continue!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Haah... Left with no other choice, I must resort to the techniques that I swore to seal away...
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Hmph, I should've known. The trembling of my arm was an omen of this moment.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Hey, big guy, don't hate me for this, but I will show you the path...
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: The pint-sized Durin jumps up wordlessly and delivers a precise kick to the calf of the red-haired Vouivre.
Whose dark mach— Gah, you, you're from A4...
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: I said, you've been reaaaaally— freaking— loooooud—
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: What are you doing here anyway, hmm? Reenacting Red Hair-zilla versus Giant Robot?
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Red Hair... what?! Don't go ascribing me a title that reeks of a cheap, shitty flick!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Ugh, no, now isn't the time for this! Get back, and stand behind me. Beware of the evil power emanating from— Hey, stop messing around!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: What a pain.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Times like these call for...... Take this!
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Hold on! Stimulating the sleeping beast invites only disaster... Wait, wait, I already said, don't just start throwing Arts at it! If you trigger the automatic counterattack mechanism, things might get incredibly dangerous—
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Huh...? The titan is slowing down?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Heh heh, direct hit.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Phew... *Yawn*... So sleepy. Welp, the rest is up to you.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Hurry, open up the cover under the big guy's robotic arm. The main control box is probably somewhere in there.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Wha... Oh... Huh?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Do you know how to work it? If not, hmm... maybe we can just blow it up.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Hurry, don't just stand there staring. That place I just hit~
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: If you keep gawking, you're gonna be eating shells real soon.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Stop pushing me.. Tsk, fine, I got it!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Heh, this god-given power is not something that should be casually revealed, but today, I'll make an exception and allow you to bear witness! Don't underestimate me... dealing with machines that stink of oil is my specialty!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: You might have a little bit of gumption, big guy, but you still lack refinement! Heed me and come to a halt!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Uhh... I actually wanted to ask you something.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Don't you feel embarrassed at all saying stuff like that?
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: None of your business!!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Phew... At least that's taken care of.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Now, who was the arrogant fool who put together such a dangerous piece of power armor and even equipped it with weapons? Hah, lucky I was here.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: (Hmm, let me see...)
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: (Oh...! This assembly looks really similar to what those neighbor kids used to put together for fun...)
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: (So then all you have to do is flip the lid here and then...)
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Phew.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: How naive. Weaponry is not something that anyone can simply fiddle with, it takes a certain refinement...... Whaaaat?!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Hold up! Don't cross the lines, it's too dangerous!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: It's fine, it's fine.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: If you don't unplug this, the big guy's gonna be up and running again.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Mm... Wrap this around, and then cut here... Alright, that should do the job. Probably.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: You're just doing random crap in there!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Stop, and listen well, if you don't want an electric shock that pierces your soul, stop what you're doing until I can finish the inspection!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: It's gonna be bad if this thing starts leaking. Well, the damage here is superficial, so it shouldn't be a problem.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: This scratch here, yeah, my last attack caused this. It didn't affect the motherboard, so the risk probably isn't too great...
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Ohh, the wiring here is certainly quite interesting. The internal design of the energy device here is rough, but well thought-out.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Huh... Hmm? The movement module seems to have traces of interference. Is this due to the influence of Originium Arts? Also, the part of the wiring responsible for the power supply has been cut...
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Are you doooone yet? My hand's getting sore.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: And... I'm falling asleep...
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Though I got the big guy to stop moving for now, the most dangerous parts are still untouched...
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Darn you... don't tell me, all that stuff you were doing before...
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: It was all a part of your plan!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Hm? What, you mean this control cable here? Didn't I say everything was fine?
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: You should give a senior Rhodes Islander a little credit, newbie.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: (Yawn)
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Though I might not be as handy a mechanic as some of my clansmen, can't lift a hammer, and can't make a giant out of sheet metal, not being able to build stuff isn't the same as not being able to deal with 'em... And this thing's real simple.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Leaving the question of your clansmen aside for now, you said this thing is... real simple?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Yep. The principles are really simple.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Oi, my red-haired friend, why the skeptical look?
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Enough with the red-haired thing! My name's Sesa! At least remember your fellow operators' codenames!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Close enough—
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Lemme think, well... Sesa, have you ever seen Myrtle's apple?
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Are you talking about the Arts device that the Engineering Department borrowed to study? That's no ordinary apple...
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Yeah, stuff like that's perfectly ordinary to us. You could buy one off the shelf in a corner store.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: What kind of place do you come from?!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Hey, it's a perfectly ordinary place—
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: The underground tribe of Durin... I'm sure I've heard someone mention them before...
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: That's not too surprising, plenty of us come up to the surface to have some fun.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: If you ask me though—the surface is nice, bright and spacious enough, with lots of interesting things, but the machinery up here's way too primitive.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: In any case... I never knew that Rhodes Island had someone like you around, formidable but willing to hide in the crowd... Hmph, I underestimated you!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Hah, say no more. You don't need to explain a thing, I already understand. I won't press you for more details about yourself.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: For people like us, this is a fate we must bear... Is that how the saying goes?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: (This red-haired tall one isn't very bright.)
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: (Not that it matters though... *Yawn*... So sleepy...)
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: (I'm about running on empty here too. After all that exercise, if I don't get some sleep... I might not be able to wake up tomorrow...)
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: If I was really as amazing as you make me sound... *yawn*... My folks wouldn't have spent all that time nagging me.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: But I'm frail, always sleepy... Sigh, it's not like I wanted to be like this...
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: It seems that your past is also shrouded in mystery.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Tell you what, based on the fact that we just fought a heart-pounding battle together, I'm willing to listen to your troubles...
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Hey, open your eyes when you walk, you'll trip!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: No way I will. So sleepy... *Yawn*...
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: This... is nothing... back home folks nagged so much that I slipped out and came here...
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: But... *yawn*... I was born this way. Can't cure it even if you tried...
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: ZZZzzzzz
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Hey, you're in the middle of a sentence, don't just fall asleep on your feet!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Uhh.... Huh?
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: (*Stretches*)
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: (*Yawn*... Did I fall asleep again? Huh, where'd this blanket come from? It's real comfy.)
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: (That red-haired tall one... Sesa, I think is his name... He's already gone, huh.)
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: My head hurts a little, what time is it...?
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: It's getting late, Durin. You slept longer than usual this time.
Oh... Rangers, huh.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: I exerted myself a little, so I ended up falling asleep. Couldn't help it.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Pops, were you the one who put the blanket over me? Thanks—
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Oh, I can't take credit for that.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: When this old man came to see you, you were already sound asleep. Aw, you looked so peaceful, I wanted to curl right up there with you.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: *Yaaawn*. The quality of my sleep is nothing to envy, Pops.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Haha, that's true.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: The young'un named Sesa had been sitting here looking after you, talking about how he owes you a favor. Ho ho, what a good kid.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Woah... He didn't just leave? I'm safe enough here on the ship.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: But, hmm. Rhodes Island sure has a lot of nice people.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Haha, we sure do.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: But, Durin, color this old man surprised to hear you went to help him. Why didn't you ask us to deal with it?
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: It was easy enough. Just felt like helping a newbie and all...
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: I've never seen you so enthusiastic about helping.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: I'm familiar with that kind of machinery. You usually don't see stuff like it on the surface... Guess you could call it nostalgia.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Fair enough. You're better than us at that sort of thing anyway.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: But enough about that! Um, this blanket here... The next time I see that red-haired tall one, I'll give this back to him.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Oh, and... Pops, what about the barbecue? Don't tell me you guys went and finished everything without me.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: I'd never do something like that, and get on your bad side.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Noir Corne is still grilling and left plenty just for you. We were waiting for you to wake up.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Sounds— good—!
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Hey, slow down, be careful not to trip. I've never seen you run that fast.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: I slept so well, I'm full of energy.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Durin.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: When I watch you sleep, I can't help but get a bit worried. And I think... the others probably feel the same way.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Your health...
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Old— Man—
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: *Breathes deeply*
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: I'm perfectly fine. Just happened to oversleep a little... What's wrong with that?
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Don't worry!
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: I go to Medical for regular check-ups, and I have no trouble with my normal work. Us Durins are tough—
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Besides, I can always just blame my condition, and nobody can get mad at me for slacking off during work hours. Isn't that great?
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: And now, if I can just eat a bunch of meat, maybe I'll grow even stronger.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Haha, I suppose...
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: ...that you'll have to eat plenty today. Let's go. Noir Corne and the others are waiting.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Woohoo—
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Hooray! Barbecue, here I come!
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Lack of energy, fatigue and listlessness, illness-prone, and a need for sleep to recover from any amount of exertion — Durin has long gotten used to having such a delicate body.
Congenital deficiency is different from disease and cannot be cured with medicine.
She used to be disgruntled and even angry about it, but when she came to the surface and saw its many stories, Durin came to terms with her physical weakness.
Like...
What does it matter if my body's a bit weaker?
Nothing beats getting sleep free and quiet under the sun during those easy hours of the workday.
